official_title: A bill to amend chapter 44 of title 18 of the United States Code to limit the availability of guns not suitable for lawful sporting purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Gun Control Act of 1968 to extend the current prohibition against importation of firearms to include the importation of any part of a firearm. Prohibits any licensed importer, manufacturer, dealer, or collector from selling or delivering any firearm which is not suitable for sporting purposes. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to make rules establishing the characteristics of firearms not suitable for lawful sporting purposes.
